Stellar Wave Infusions are a natural part of the DNA evolution process and will become part of the experiential reality of humans upon the Bridge Zone or Ascension paths. The first Stellar Activation begins following an infusion of energy into the Earth’s core, through which the Earth’s core particle pulsation rhythm is raised high enough to merge with the frequency bands of the first Stellar Spi- ral, when it aligns with Earth’s Merkaba Fields during the ascension cycle. 466
